title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: Stimulus sets use webmorphR.

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: can install development version webmorphR.stim GitHub : Please cite individual stimulus sets use publications:

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: Images 102 adult faces 1350x1350 pixels full colour. Template files mark 189 coordinates delineating face shape, use Psychomorph WebMorph.org. Self-reported age, gender ethnicity included london_info. individuals gave signed consent images “used lab-based web-based studies original altered forms illustrate research (e.g., scientific journals, news media presentations).” Images taken London, UK, April 2012. CC-: DeBruine, L., & Jones, B. (2017). Face Research Lab London Set (Version 5). figshare. https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.5047666.v5

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: Smiling versions 102 individuals London set. CC-: DeBruine, L., & Jones, B. (2017). Face Research Lab London Set (Version 5). figshare. https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.5047666.v5

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: image set comprises 5 male 5 female composite images (4 individuals per composite) adult individuals African, East Asian, West Asian White ethnic backgrounds London set , plus composite image 4 ethnic groupings. Images 1350x1350 pixels full colour. CC-: DeBruine, Lisa (2016): Young adult composite faces. figshare. https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.4055130.v1

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: image set comprises 50 White men 50 White women ages 18-35. images derived images www.3D.sk, purchased Lisa DeBruine Benedict Jones commercial license, allows sharing publication derivative images educational use. CC-: DeBruine L, Jones B (2020). 3DSK face set webmorph templates. OSF. https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/A3947

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: CC-0: Four images person varying face size, position rotation.

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: CC-0: Four images person varying head--camera distance (approximately 15, 30, 45 60 cm).

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: image set contains images 20 male 20 female young adult White students university Ontario, Canada. images aligned pupils delineated using WebMorph.org. images JPGs 1350x1800 pixels. Self-reported age gender included canada_info. CC-: DeBruine, L., & Jones, B.. (2017).Young Adult White Faces Manipulated Versions (Version1). figshare. https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.4220517.v1

title: Demo Stimuli for webmorphR
text: image set contains 18 images Pixabay, using Pixabay License, free commercial noncommercial use without attribution, although can find available attributions rainbow_info. images 640 pixels wide varying heights.

title: 3DSK Average Ratings — avg_3dsk_info
text: dataset containing information 100 images 3dsk image set load_stim_3dsk(). images www.3D.sk, purchased Lisa DeBruine Benedict Jones commercial license, allows sharing publication derivative images educational use. Ratings 100 male 100 female raters face_gender:trait scale 1-7. See raw_3dsk_info unaggregated data details.

title: 3DSK Average Ratings — avg_3dsk_info
text: data frame 100 rows 8 variables: face_id name ID 3d.sk face_gender face's gender (female, male) face_age face's age (years) att mean attractiveness rating dom mean dominance rating health mean health rating sexdim mean sexual dimorphism rating; masculinity male faces femininity female faces trust mean trustworthiness rating

title: 3DSK Average Ratings — avg_3dsk_info
text: https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/A3947

title: 3DSK Average Ratings — avg_3dsk_info
code: head(avg_3dsk_info) #> # A tibble: 6 × 8 #>   face_id   face_gender face_age   att   dom health sexdim trust #>   <chr>     <chr>          <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 agata     female            29  3.02  3.58   3.72   3.93  3.48 #> 2 alexandra female            22  2.57  4.06   3.52   3.76  2.51 #> 3 alica     female            18  2.55  2.81   3.10   3.82  3.50 #> 4 anastazie female            22  3.39  4.72   4.01   3.72  2.84 #> 5 andrea    female            20  4.41  4.04   4.97   4.89  3.67 #> 6 anezka    female            26  1.9   3.50   3.02   2.56  3.01

title: Load image set — load_stim
text: Load image sets stimlist, ready processing webmorphR functions. See Details citation links.

title: Load image set — load_stim
code: load_stim(   set = c("neutral_front", "smiling_front", "3dsk", "composite", "canada", "lisa",     "zoom", "rainbow"),   pattern = NULL )  load_stim_canada(pattern = NULL)  load_stim_london(pattern = NULL)  load_stim_neutral(pattern = NULL)  load_stim_zoom(pattern = NULL)  load_stim_smiling(pattern = NULL)  load_stim_composite(pattern = NULL)  load_stim_lisa(pattern = NULL)  load_stim_rainbow(pattern = NULL)  load_stim_3dsk(pattern = NULL)

title: Load image set — load_stim
text: set name image set pattern Vector patterns use search files, vector image indices

title: Load image set — load_stim
text: list class stimlist

title: Load image set — load_stim
text: neutral/smiling: CC-https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.5047666.v5 composite: CC-https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.4055130.v1 canada: CC-https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.4220517.v1 3dsk: https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/A3947, via https://www.3d.sk educational use lisa/zoom: CC-0 images package creator rainbow: see rainbow_info individual image credits

title: Load image set — load_stim
code: # loads the first 5 images in the set stim <- load_stim("rainbow", 1:5)  # loads all images with 3 digits and m canada_male <- load_stim("canada", "[0-9]{3}m")

title: London Set Information — london_info
text: dataset containing information 102 faces Face Research Lab London Set. Corresponds demo sets load_stim_neutral() andload_stim_smiling().

title: London Set Information — london_info
text: data frame 102 rows 4 variables: face_id face's ID face_gender face's gender (female, male) face_age face's age (19-47 years) face_eth face's ethnic group (black, east_asian, west_asian, white)

title: London Set Information — london_info
text: https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/Face_Research_Lab_London_Set/5047666?file=27397184

title: London Set Information — london_info
code: head(london_info) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   face_id face_age face_gender face_eth   #>   <chr>      <int> <chr>       <chr>      #> 1 001           24 female      white      #> 2 002           24 female      white      #> 3 003           38 female      white      #> 4 004           30 male        white      #> 5 005           28 male        east_asian #> 6 006           31 female      west_asian

title: Rainbow Set Information — rainbow_info

title: Rainbow Set Information — rainbow_info
text: data frame 18 rows 8 variables: photo_name name phto inthe simulus set photo_id numeric ID Pixabay photographer photographer's name user_name photographer's pixabay username user_id photographer's pixabay user ID colour general colour image type whether image animal, landscape, flower url pixabay URL image

title: Rainbow Set Information — rainbow_info
code: head(rainbow_info) #> # A tibble: 6 × 8 #>   photo_name          photo_id photographer user_name user_id colour type  url   #>   <chr>                  <int> <chr>        <chr>       <int> <fct>  <fct> <chr> #> 1 bled-2608425_640     2608425 David Mark   12019      1.20e4 purple land… http… #> 2 bright-4642061_640   4642061 Nika Akin    nika_akin  1.35e7 purple anim… http… #> 3 butterfly-142506_6…   142506 Garoch       garoch     1.03e4 blue   anim… http… #> 4 cardinal-2872966_6…  2872966 Jill Wellin… jillwell…  3.34e5 red    anim… http… #> 5 flower-2071522_640   2071522 NaturePhoto  natureph…  1.93e5 green  flow… http… #> 6 flowers-3215188_640  3215188 CANDICE CAN… candiix    7.10e6 orange flow… http…

title: 3DSK Raw Ratings — raw_3dsk_info
text: dataset containing information 100 images 3dsk image set load_stim_3dsk(). images www.3D.sk, purchased Lisa DeBruine Benedict Jones commercial license, allows sharing publication derivative images educational use.

title: 3DSK Raw Ratings — raw_3dsk_info
text: data frame 100000 rows 8 variables: face_id name ID 3d.sk face_gender face's gender (female, male) face_age face's age (years) rater_id rater's anonymous ID rater_gender rater's gender (female, male) rater_age rater's age (years) trait trait rated (att, dom, health, sexdim, trust) rating rating 1-7 scale

title: 3DSK Raw Ratings — raw_3dsk_info
text: https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/A3947

title: 3DSK Raw Ratings — raw_3dsk_info
text: Face images rated online faceresearch.org. Raters randomly allocated rate either 50 male 50 female faces one attractiveness, dominance, health, sexual dimorphism (masculinity/femininity), trustworthiness using 1 (much less trait adjective average) 7 (much trait adjective average). Male faces rated masculinity female faces femininity. Data first one hundred heterosexual men one hundred heterosexual women ages 18 40 rating combination face gender trait (2000 raters total). Trial order fully randomised rater rating tasks self paced.

title: 3DSK Raw Ratings — raw_3dsk_info
code: head(raw_3dsk_info) #> # A tibble: 6 × 8 #>   face_id   face_gender face_age rater_id rater_gender rater_age trait rating #>   <chr>     <chr>          <dbl> <chr>    <chr>            <dbl> <chr>  <dbl> #> 1 alex      male              20 R0001    male              36.4 att        1 #> 2 alexander male              20 R0001    male              36.4 att        1 #> 3 alfred    male              30 R0001    male              36.4 att        1 #> 4 ambroz    male              29 R0001    male              36.4 att        1 #> 5 arnold    male              26 R0001    male              36.4 att        1 #> 6 arpad     male              26 R0001    male              36.4 att        1
